name: Marco Polo (itch)
description:
FOR THIS GAME YOU REQUIRE A COMPUTER WITH A WORKING MICROPHONE!

For the fifth week in my game a week course, I teamed up with fellow student, game designer and all around amazing person Delrell! They're a sweet person and great to work with, and I had tons of fun on this project <3 so thanks for working with me bud! This week's theme was Voice, so we have a game that has voice input as its main component. To play, call out Marco to hear your quarry and escape the haunted pool! I made all the assets, and Delrell did all the code and unity stuff for this. Their links are down below! Please go follow because they're making some super interesting stuff!! :) Enjoy!
